text: Armando António Capelo Diniz da Gama (1 April 1954 – 17 January 2022) was a Portuguese pop singer-songwriter and baritone opera singer. He was born in Luanda, Portuguese Angola. His career began in 1971. Gama performed at the 1983 Eurovision Song Contest, singing the song "Esta balada que te dou". He came in 13th place. Gama died at a hospital from cancer in Lisbon, Portugal at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese singers Category:Portuguese writers Category:Pop singers Category:Singer-songwriters Category:Opera singers
title: Armando Gama
